channel.title: NBA.com: News
channel.description: NBA.com delivers the latest news, video, and scores from around the NBA league.
channel.copyright: Copyright (c) 2018NBA Media Ventures, LLC. All rights reserved.

item.title: Houston Rockets guard James Harden out at least two weeks with hamstring strain
item.description: The Houston Rockets announced on Monday that All-NBA guard James Harden suffered a Grade 2 hamstring strain during Sunday's double-overtime win over the Lakers, forcing him to miss at least two weeks of action before being re-evaluated.

item.title: Zach LaVine inching closer to Chicago Bulls debut
item.description: The Chicago Bulls are closer to seeing the full return of their offseason trade on the court.

item.title: Milwaukee Bucks assign rehabbing Jabari Parker to Wisconsin Herd
item.description: MILWAUKEE -- The Milwaukee Bucks have assigned forward Jabari Parker to the Wisconsin Herd of the NBA G League to continue his rehabilitation process.

item.title: Portland Trail Blazers guard Damian Lillard continues to sit with strained hamstring
item.description: The Portland Trail Blazers will play their fifth consecutive game without star guard Damian Lillard, who is still recovering from a strained right hamstring, when they visit the Chicago Bulls on Monday night.

item.title: Cleveland Cavaliers' Isaiah Thomas to make season debut Tuesday vs. Trail Blazers
item.description: CLEVELAND (AP) -- The agonizing wait to play again is over for Isaiah Thomas. Vengeance on the Celtics is still on hold.

item.title: Philadelphia 76ers center Joel Embiid injures right hand; X-rays negative
item.description: PHOENIX (AP) -- Philadelphia center Joel Embiid injured his right hand going after an inbounds pass late in the fourth quarter of the 76ers' 123-110 victory over the Phoenix Suns on Sunday night.

item.title: James Harden exits Sunday's game with strained left hamstring
item.description: Rockets guard James Harden limped to the locker room Sunday night in the fourth quarter with a strained left hamstring.

item.title: NBA Plays of the Week: Dec. 24 - 30 (Week 11)
Oklahoma City Thunder's Patrick Patterson fined $10K for criticizing officiating
item.description: NEW YORK (AP) -- Oklahoma City Thunder forward Patrick Patterson has been fined $10,000 for publicly complaining about the officiating during the 2017-18 season.

item.title: Injured Austin Rivers to miss Los Angeles Clippers' game against Charlotte Hornets
item.description: LOS ANGELES (AP) -- Clippers guard Austin Rivers will miss the Los Angeles' game Sunday against Charlotte after injuring his right Achilles.
